item.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce - Component Overview
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Visual overview of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce architecture and component structure. Understand the key components and their relationships in the Commerce ecosystem.

item.title: Filtering options Dynamics 365 Finance Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Master all filtering options in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations including Filter Pane, QuickFilter, and grid column filtering. Comprehensive guide with filter expressions and advanced techniques.

item.title: Remove a person from an user Dynamics 365 Finance Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Remove person associations from system users in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations. Simple solution for user administration when person field becomes grayed out.

item.title: Dynamics 365 FinOps Data Integration using Microsoft Forms (Part 2)
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Continue the Microsoft Forms integration series with advanced Power Automate flows and custom entity configurations for D365 Finance Operations data management.
